name: Bobcoin (XBC)
description: Given my fascination in blockchain technologies and Bitcoin, I've decided to make my own cryptocurrency from scratch. It features <abbr title='Proof of work'>PoW</abbr> consensus, digital signatures, merkle trees, the <abbr title='Unspent transaction output'>UTXO</abbr> model, <abbr title='Bitcoin improvement proposal'>BIP</abbr> compliant wallets, a block explorer, mining client, and many more.
